self.player.next_idx()

    def up_key_event(self):
        datalist = self.datalist
        offset = self.offset
        idx = self.index
        step = self.step
        if idx == offset:
            if offset == 0:
                return
            self.offset -= step
            # 移动光标到最后一列
            self.index = offset - 1
        else:
            self.index = carousel(
                offset, min(len(datalist), offset + step) - 1, idx - 1
            )
        self.menu_starts = time.time()
